General.Name: Latin Resources Ltd
General.Description: Latin Resources Limited engages in the exploration and evaluation of mining projects in Australia, Brazil, Peru, and Argentina. The company primarily explores for lithium, silver, lead, copper, and gold deposits. Its flagship project comprises the Salinas Lithium project that comprises approximately 6,230 hectares located in the Jequitinhonha Valley district of Minas Gerais, Brazil. Latin Resources Limited was incorporated in 2008 and is based in West Leederville, Australia.
General.Address: 32 Harrogate Street, West Leederville, WA, Australia, 6007
